casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 28, 2010

[Cite as 1012812010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-5213.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Bikkani.

On March 5, 2007, this court found Prasad Bikkani to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 14.5(B). This court further ordered that Bikkani was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On October 12, 2010, Bikkani submitted a motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file is denied.
